base_description: Gray dome-shaped object with brown base.
part_description: The object has a smooth, gray dome top and a circular, flat brown base. The dome is positioned centrally on the base.
internal_interaction_description: The gray dome is securely attached to the brown base, providing stability. The base serves as a support structure, ensuring the dome remains upright and balanced.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces and interacts with gravity to maintain its position. It may be used as a decorative item or functional component, depending on context.
